meanings.sent1: The glycolytic pathway is essential for energy production in cells.
meanings.sent2: Cells use glycolytic processes to break down glucose for energy.
meanings.sent3: The party was so glycolytic with all the dancing and movement.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was glycolytic, fueling the team's motivation.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with glycolytic excitement during the science experiment.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the breakdown of glucose in cells to produce energy.
meanings.sent1: The glycolytic activity in the muscle cells increased during exercise.
meanings.sent2: Energy production in cells is dependent on glycolytic processes.
meanings.sent3: The bakery was a glycolytic paradise with all the sugary treats.
meanings.sent4: His determination was glycolytic, powering through the tough workout.
meanings.sent5: The city streets pulsed with glycolytic vitality during the marathon.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the process of glycolysis.
meanings.sent1: The glycolytic nature of the reaction was evident in the lab results.
meanings.sent2: The cell's glycolytic function was crucial for its survival.
meanings.sent3: The garden was a glycolytic wonderland with all the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was glycolytic, sparking new ideas in the team.
meanings.sent5: The concert hall echoed with glycolytic energy during the performance.
